text: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabba nti me bhikkhave pubbe pe udapādi
edit: Taṃ kho panidaṃ dukkhanirodhagāminī paṭipadā ariyasaccaṃ bhāvetabba nti me bhikkhave pubbe pe udapādi

translations.transtext: Monks, vision, insight, ... thus, "That path leading to the cessation of suffering as a noble truth should be cultivated."
